title: The Ritual of Crimson Stars
description: Investigate a mysterious cult in the underhive. Uncover ancient secrets and prevent a dark ritual.

scenes.name: Underhive Entrance
scenes.description: The descent into darkness begins. Rusted metal stairs lead down into the forgotten levels beneath the hive city.

events.text: The air grows thick with decay. Strange symbols mark the wallsâ€”symbols that should not exist.

scenes.name: Slum District
scenes.description: Desperate people huddle in the shadows. They avert their eyes as you pass. Fear hangs heavy in the air.

scenes.name: Abandoned Chapel
scenes.description: Once a place of worship to the God-Emperor. Now defiled with heretical symbols and strange offerings.

events.text: The altar bears recent bloodstains. A hidden mechanism clicks beneath your touch...

scenes.name: Hidden Passage
scenes.description: A secret tunnel carved from the underhive's foundation. Ancient and purposeful.

scenes.name: Ritual Chamber
scenes.description: The heart of darkness. Robed figures chant in forbidden tongues. A portal begins to tear reality itself.

events.text: The cult leader turns to face you. 'Too late, Inquisitor. The Crimson Stars align. Witness our ascension!'

items.name: Inquisitorial Laspistol
items.description: A finely crafted weapon bearing the seal of the Inquisition.

items.name: Investigation Kit
items.description: Tools for analyzing evidence and uncovering secrets.

items.name: Witness Testimony
items.description: A frightened civilian's account of strange gatherings.

items.name: Tome of Forbidden Knowledge
items.description: A book that should be burned. But it contains clues...

items.name: Ancient Key
items.description: A key of unknown origin. It thrums with unnatural energy.

items.name: Ritual Dagger
items.description: The ceremonial weapon used in the cult's dark practices.

items.name: Holy Symbol of the Emperor
items.description: Sacred icon of the God-Emperor. Provides spiritual protection.

items.name: Torch
items.description: Simple light source for dark places.

npcs.name: Terrified Resident
npcs.description: A local who knows more than they're willing to say.
dialogue: They take people in the night. We don't ask questions.
The chapel... something evil dwells there now.

npcs.name: Cult Sentinel
npcs.description: A hooded figure guarding the passage. Armed and fanatical.

npcs.name: High Priest of the Crimson Stars
npcs.description: The mastermind behind the ritual. Eyes burning with madness and power.
dialogue: Your Emperor is nothing before the Crimson Stars!

npcs.name: Lesser Daemon
npcs.description: A warp entity partially materialized through the failing ritual. Volatile and dangerous.

puzzles.name: Decipher Heretical Symbols
puzzles.description: Decode the symbols to reveal the hidden passage.

solution.success_text: The symbols form a pattern. A hidden door opens with a grinding sound.

puzzles.name: Unlock the Sealed Door
puzzles.description: Use the ancient key to open the ritual chamber.

solution.success_text: The key turns. Beyond lies horror incarnate.

puzzles.name: Disrupt the Ritual
puzzles.description: Destroy the ritual components before the portal fully opens.

solution.success_text: You shatter the dagger on the altar. The portal collapses with a scream of rage.
